foods.name: Tuna Casserole
foods.imageAlt: take a bite! of tuna casserole :)
foods.story: I used to love tuna casserole my dad used to make it all the time as a kid then he stopped for some reason!!

foods.name: Eggnog
foods.story: People say that they don't like eggnog but I just think that's because they've never had Hood's Golden Eggnog. I swear I can drink this like water. During the holidays I probably drink 5 gallons of this stuff. My dad always makes sure theres at least 2 gallons in the fridge when I come home for Christmas. Eggnog Season is Nov 1-Whenever they stop selling 'Nog.

foods.name: Lobster
foods.story: I love Lobster!!! Once my friend surprised me for my birthday by buying some lobster to cook at our campsite. She stabbed through their heads thinking it would kill them quickly before flamb√©ing, but instead they writhed and writhed...it was horrific. But I love eating lobster so much that it didn't deter me. On my birthday I spend over $100 eating lobster for every meal.
